Articles.Content:
http://en.akinator.com/

Basically, he is a genie who asks you a series of questions.

Now while this thread has been brought up before, it's old as hell and I'm not going to bump it. Plus, we got a lot of people sense then, we should have some people see it again.

He is so good at what he does, you can go for Neil Armstrong, ask you not too many questions and he will get it right, even if you don't know some of the questions. He even has our kerbals in there, and Harvester too (I think)!

Post his amazingness here
